name: TACTILE (Uneven Prankster, Dead Toaster Games)
description:
April's Silliest Sokoban Action.

Go through various mazes and defeat Cone! You can do it! It won't be easy though...

Amazing Graphics

These are the best ones yet from Uneven! Amazing pixel art and next level 3D graphics will surely stun your eyes.

Cool Controls

WASD (DPAD, Left Joystick) - Move

R - Try stage again (if you messed up a maze!)

Q (DualShock Circle, Xbox B, Nintendo A) - Decline Option for RPG fight

E (DualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B) - Accept Option for RPG fight

ESC (Select DualShock Share, Nintendo -) - Exit game

F12 (Start, DualShock Options, Nintendo +) -  Toggle Fullscreen

Music by DemisurgeX,

Additional Art by RoligtJackson,

Made by Uneven Prankster.
